results.description: Combine price momentum with hedge fund ownership to favor stocks with strong momentum but low hedge fund ownership. Applied SUGGESTION1 by using two fields. SUGGESTION4 used: both fields have high userCount/alphaCount (momentum userCount=109, hedge_fund_ownership_percent userCount=119) and coverage=1.0 so signal is reliable. No VECTOR fields identified (SUGGESTION2 not applied). Coverage high so ts_backfill not needed (SUGGESTION3 not applied). Confidence set to 0.78 based on widespread use of these factors.

results.idea: Short-term reversal signal adjusted for market cap
results.description: Use 1-day reversal factor to short recent winners and long recent losers, scaled by market cap to reduce microcap noise. Used two fields per SUGGESTION1. rsk70_1drevrsl has huge userCount; current_market_cap_usd also high, coverage=1.0. No vector fields. No backfill needed. Confidence 0.74.

Favor stocks where model momentum is strong relative to recent daily specific return (idiosyncratic surprise). Applies SUGGESTION1; daily_specific_return and rsk70 momentum have high userCounts. No vector use. Coverage high. Confidence 0.76.

Short stocks with high hedge fund ownership percent and long low percent (mean-reversion of crowding). Single main signal uses hedge_fund_ownership_percent (SUGGESTION1 partially applied). Field has very high userCount/alphaCount and coverage=1.0. No vector/backfill. Confidence 0.72.

results.idea: Momentum scaled by specific risk (risk-adjusted momentum)
results.description: Downweight momentum by specific risk variance to prefer high momentum with lower idiosyncratic risk. Used two fields per SUGGESTION1. specific_risk_variance and momentum have adequate userCounts. Coverage=1.0. Confidence 0.77.

Short stocks with extreme positive sentiment and long extreme negative sentiment using sentiment factor. Used rsk70_mfm2_usfast_sentmt (high userCount/alphaCount). Single field used because it's strong (SUGGESTION1 partially). Coverage=1.0; no backfill. Confidence 0.71.

Long stocks with strong momentum and undervalued (high momentum minus value factor). Uses two factors (SUGGESTION1). Both factors have high userCounts and coverage ~1.0. No vector/backfill. Confidence 0.75.

Use z-score cross-sectional normalization on momentum to avoid concentration. Single-field implementation chosen for simplicity; used zscore operator per SUGGESTION1. Momentum has high usage. Confidence 0.73.

Exploit stocks with rising short interest expecting mean reversion; combine short interest with 1-day reversal to detect short squeezes. Two fields used per SUGGESTION1; both have good userCounts. Coverage=1.0. Confidence 0.69.

Favor stocks where hedge funds are increasing ownership but momentum is positive (crowding confirmation). Uses hedge_fund_ownership_percent and momentum (SUGGESTION1). Both high usage. No vector/backfill. Confidence 0.70.

Short stocks with high residual volatility and long low residual volatility expecting volatility premium. Uses rsk70_resvol and specific_risk_variance (SUGGESTION1). Both have solid userCounts. Confidence 0.66.
Combine short interest and size: target high short interest in large caps (reduce microcap risk). Two fields used; both high coverage. SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.68.

Prioritize momentum inside stocks with high earnings quality factor loading to reduce downside. Uses rsk70_earnqlty and momentum (SUGGESTION1). earnqlty coverage 0.9512; ts_backfill not needed (coverage>0.6) but noted. Confidence 0.72.

Long stocks where prospect_specret_daily (prospect's specific return) is positive but daily_specific_return is negative (model vs idiosyncratic divergence). Uses two fields per SUGGESTION1; both have high userCounts. Confidence 0.71.
Signal stocks with high short interest and recent positive ts_returns (squeeze candidates) to ride momentum. Two fields used. Both have good userCounts. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: Hedge fund ownership percent trend signal
results.description: Use ts_delta on hedge fund ownership percent to find increasing or decreasing institutional flows. Single field with high userCount used per SUGGESTION4. Coverage 1.0. Confidence 0.65.

Favor momentum after adjusting for market sensitivity (beta) to reduce market-driven momentum. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_beta (SUGGESTION1). Both high usage. Confidence 0.74.

results.idea: Value pick with low hedge fund ownership
results.description: Long undervalued stocks (value factor) that are under-owned by hedge funds for contrarian value play. Two fields used; userCounts high for value and hedge ownership. Confidence 0.70.

results.idea: Sector rotation: semiconductors momentum over market
results.description: Favor semiconductor exposure combined with idiosyncratic momentum to capture sector-specific rallies. Uses semiconductors_exposure_score and rsk70 momentum (SUGGESTION1). Semiconductor field userCount=6; acceptable. Confidence 0.68.

Use net_retail_exposure_score to detect over/under-exposed retail stocks and apply mean-reversion overlay with short-interest. Uses two fields per SUGGESTION1. Both have good userCounts. Confidence 0.66.
Combine sentiment factor with market cap weighting to favor large cap positive sentiment momentum. Two fields used; both high coverage. Confidence 0.69.
Use long-term reversal factor (ltrevrsl) and scale to avoid small-cap noise using market cap. SUGGESTION1 applied. ltrevrsl coverage 0.9903. Confidence 0.71.
Combine model momentum with daily_specific_return to capture stocks where model and idiosyncratic signals align. Used two fields with high userCounts (SUGGESTION1). Confidence 0.75.
Fade extreme hedge fund ownership after recent spikes using ts_delta to detect rapid changes. Single primary field used with ts_delta (SUGGESTION1). High userCount supports confidence 0.67.
Use prospect_specret_monthly to detect monthly earnings/emission surprises and combine with momentum. Two fields used; both with strong userCounts. Confidence 0.70.

Long stocks low in both short interest and hedge fund ownership, short the opposite to capture under-owned low short interest winners. Uses two fields (SUGGESTION1). Both high userCounts. Confidence 0.65.
Favor momentum where management quality loading is high to reduce governance risk. Uses rsk70_mgmtqlty and momentum (SUGGESTION1). mgmtqlty coverage 0.8817; no backfill needed. Confidence 0.72.

results.idea: Residual return momentum with volatility taper
results.description: Use daily_specific_return (residual) momentum but taper by ts_std_dev to avoid volatile winners. Two fields used; both high userCounts. Confidence 0.74.
Combine earnings yield style factor with momentum to capture momentum in quality value stocks. Uses rsk70_earnyild and momentum (SUGGESTION1). Coverage high. Confidence 0.73.

results.idea: Short-term reversal weighted by specific risk
results.description: Apply short-term reversal but downweight when specific risk variance is high to avoid idiosyncratic traps. Two fields used. Confidence 0.70.
Long stocks where prospect_specret_daily is higher than model's daily_specific_return — indicates positive idiosyncratic momentum. Two fields used; both high userCounts. Confidence 0.71.

results.idea: High momentum, low hedge fund ownership breakout
results.description: Target breakout momentum in under-owned stocks (low hedge ownership) to capture early-stage rallies. Two fields used; hedge ownership and momentum have high userCounts. Confidence 0.69.
Amplify momentum signal for stocks with high semiconductor exposure to capture sector momentum. Two fields used; semiconductors_exposure_score userCount reasonable. Confidence 0.66.
Use zscore to normalize short_interest_factor_score cross-sectionally to avoid scale issues (SUGGESTION1). High userCount. Confidence 0.64.
Subtract residual volatility loading from momentum to favor stable momentum. Two fields used; both with good counts. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Hedge fund ownership percent cross-sectional zscore momentum
results.description: Use hedge fund ownership percent zscore as contrarian overlay on momentum. Two fields used; both high userCounts. Confidence 0.70.

results.idea: Momentum conditioned on low specific risk
results.description: Trade momentum only when specific_risk_variance is below median to reduce idiosyncratic drawdowns. Two fields used (SUGGESTION1). Confidence 0.72.

results.idea: Momentum with hedge fund ownership momentum filter
results.description: Require hedge funds to be increasing ownership and momentum positive for confirmation. Two fields used and ts_delta applied to hedge ownership. High userCount fields. Confidence 0.68.
Neutralize momentum by size via divide by size zscore to avoid small-cap bias. Two fields used; both robust. Confidence 0.71.

results.idea: Earnings quality fade of extreme moves
results.description: Fade extreme short-term momentum when earnings quality is low (protect against earnings-driven crashes). Two fields used; earnqlty coverage ~0.95. Confidence 0.69.
Scale prospect_specret_daily by its ts_std_dev to prefer steady positive prospects. Two fields used (same field used in ts_std_dev). Confidence 0.70.
Long when short interest high but momentum negative (expect squeeze), short when opposite. Uses two fields per SUGGESTION1. Confidence 0.66.
Amplify value signal when sentiment is improving to capture sentiment-driven re-rating. Two fields used. Sentiment has high userCount. Confidence 0.72.
Apply ts_decay_linear to recent residual volatility-adjusted momentum to control turnover and emphasize recent signal. Uses ts_decay_linear and momentum. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Hedge fund ownership percent vs count divergence
results.description: Long stocks where percent ownership declines but hedge_fund_ownership_count increases (divergence) signaling new small positions — two fields used. Both have very high userCounts. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: Momentum filtered by short interest stability
results.description: Require short interest to be stable (low ts_std_dev) before taking momentum positions to avoid volatile shorting pressure. Two fields used. Confidence 0.67.
Favor momentum in stocks with high profit factor loading (profitability) to reduce drawdown risk. Two fields used; rsk70 profit has good userCount. Confidence 0.73.

results.idea: Short-term reversal scaled by hedge fund ownership
results.description: Apply short-term reversal but reduce position where hedge funds heavily own the stock (crowded). Two fields used; both high usage. Confidence 0.70.

results.idea: Momentum except in high specific risk
results.description: Zero out momentum positions when specific risk uncertainty is high to avoid estimation error. Uses specific_risk_uncertainty and momentum. Coverage high. Confidence 0.72.
Take momentum only when short_interest is not extreme (filter out stressed names). Uses two fields per SUGGESTION1. Confidence 0.66.
Downweight momentum by final specific risk (srisk) to favor cleaner momentum. Two fields used; srisk has good userCount. Confidence 0.74.

results.idea: Hedge fund percent zscore cross-sectional mean-reversion
results.description: Use cross-sectional zscore on hedge fund ownership percent and reverse extremes for contrarian alpha. Single field strong usage. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Momentum combined with short-term reversal ratio
results.description: Use momentum scaled by inverse of short-term reversal loading to avoid stocks prone to rapid reversion. Two fields used. Confidence 0.70.
Fade sectors with extreme exposure scores (e.g., net_retail_exposure_score) expecting sector mean-reversion. Single sector field used per idea. SUGGESTION1 not needed. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Momentum scaled by dividend yield loading
results.description: Combine momentum with dividend yield style loading to capture momentum in income-supported stocks. Two fields used; rsk70 divyild has high userCount. Confidence 0.69.
Use ts_delta on short interest to find spikes (potential squeezes) and go long when spike coincides with positive returns. Two fields used. Confidence 0.65.
Cap momentum signals for names with residual volatility above a threshold to avoid outsized risk. Two fields used. Confidence 0.71.

results.idea: Hedge fund percent cross-sectional rank momentum
results.description: Rank hedge fund ownership and prefer low-ranked names when momentum is positive (contrarian momentum). Two fields used and quantile used for ranking. Confidence 0.69.

results.idea: Prospect daily momentum scaled by market cap
results.description: Favor prospect_specret_daily in larger caps to avoid small-cap noise. Two fields used. Confidence 0.68.
Subtract seasonal loading from momentum to avoid seasonal factor exposures. Uses season field and momentum. season coverage 0.8416; applied SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence 0.66.
High short interest relative to hedge fund ownership flags potential mispricings; long when ratio high and momentum positive. Uses two fields (SUGGESTION1). Confidence 0.65.
Use ts_arg_max on sentiment to detect recent peaks and trade momentum accordingly (fade recent extremes). Uses sentiment and momentum (SUGGESTION1). Confidence 0.67.
Create size buckets and neutralize momentum across them by dividing by size quantile to maintain size neutrality. Two fields used; operator count limited. Confidence 0.70.
Long momentum in names with increasing hedge fund percent minus those with decreasing ownership. Uses ts_delta on hedge fund percent and momentum. Confidence 0.66.
Apply short-term reversal but prefer high-profit stocks to reduce downside. Two fields used; profit factor has high userCount. Confidence 0.71.

results.idea: Momentum signal winsorized to reduce outliers
results.description: Winsorize momentum to limit extreme weights and reduce turnover. Single field used with winsorize. SUGGESTION1 partially applied. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Hedge fund ownership percent decile rotation
results.description: Bucket hedge fund ownership percent and long low-decile, short high-decile to capture ownership premia. Single field bucketed (GROUP not used alone). Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: Momentum combined with management quality zscore
results.description: Multiply momentum by mgmtqlty zscore to favor stocks with both momentum and good management. Two fields used; mgmtqlty userCount good. Confidence 0.72.

Use ts_ir on daily_specific_return to favor stocks with high risk-adjusted residual performance. Single field with ts_ir applied (SUGGESTION1). daily_specific_return has very high userCount. Confidence 0.75.

results.idea: Momentum with specific risk variance floor
results.description: Set momentum to NaN for names with very high specific risk variance using trade_when. Two fields used. Confidence 0.71.

results.idea: Hedge fund ownership percent momentum divergence
results.description: Long stocks where hedge fund percent is low but ownership count is rising — early accumulation. Two fields used per SUGGESTION1. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Momentum filtered by dividend yield stability
results.description: Require dividend yield style loading stability (low ts_std_dev) before taking momentum to avoid yield-driven reversals. Two fields used; divyild userCount high. Confidence 0.67.
Only trade momentum when short interest and momentum align (both high to short or both low to long). Two fields used. Confidence 0.66.
Fade extreme daily_specific_return tails using tail operator to clamp values, reducing exposure to outliers. Single field applied (SUGGESTION1). Confidence 0.68.
Divide momentum by leverage style loading to avoid highly leveraged momentum traps. Two fields used; leverage userCount high. Confidence 0.69.
Long stocks where hedge_fund_ownership_percent has recently decayed (ts_delta negative), expecting reversal. Single field with ts_delta used. Confidence 0.63.
Smooth momentum using ts_zscore to reduce outliers and standardize across time. Single field used; SUGGESTION1 partially applied. Confidence 0.72.
Take contrarian positions on short interest while neutralizing by market cap using divide operation. Two fields used. Confidence 0.65.
Select top quantile of momentum cross-sectionally to form long book and bottom quantile for short book. Single field quantiled. Confidence 0.73.
Favor momentum in healthcare_equipment_exposure_score heavy names to capture sector-specific strength. Two fields used; healthcare_equipment userCount=6. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Momentum expressed vs prospect daily IR
results.description: Compare momentum to prospect_specret_daily's ts_ir to find momentum with strong prospect IR. Two fields used. Confidence 0.71.

results.idea: Hedge fund percent zscore momentum crossover
results.description: Trade momentum only when hedge fund ownership percent is below its cross-sectional mean (zscore negative) — early accumulation. Two fields used. Confidence 0.68.
Rank stocks by momentum and short interest and favor high momentum/low short interest (lower squeeze risk). Two fields used. Confidence 0.67.
Divide momentum by srisku to prefer signals with lower unadjusted specific risk. Two fields used; srisku userCount good. Confidence 0.72.

results.idea: Momentum conditional on low hedge fund growth
results.description: Only take momentum when hedge fund ownership growth (ts_delta) is moderate to avoid crowded momentum trades. Two fields used. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Hedge fund ownership percent extremes paired with momentum
results.description: Go long low-percent, high-momentum names and short high-percent, low-momentum names (contrarian across ownership). Two fields used. Confidence 0.68.
Multiply momentum by winsorized short interest to limit extreme short-interest influence. Two fields used. Confidence 0.67.
Use difference between prospect monthly and prospect daily specific returns to detect building trends. Single-field family but two derived measures from same field (allowed). Confidence 0.69.
Subtract industry/regional momentum (regmom) from stock momentum to get stock-specific momentum. Two fields used; regmom userCount high. Confidence 0.74.

results.idea: Hedge fund percent mean-reversion with market cap floor
results.description: Fade hedge fund ownership extremes only for names above a market cap threshold to avoid microcap noise. Two fields used. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Momentum combined with decreasing specific risk
results.description: Favor momentum where specific risk variance is decreasing (ts_delta negative) indicating improving idiosyncratic stability. Two fields used. Confidence 0.70.
Only trade momentum when short-interest zscore is within [-1,1] to avoid extreme short squeezes or distress. Two fields used. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Momentum with quantile hedging using hedge fund percent
results.description: Long top momentum quantile but hedge by shorting names in top hedge fund ownership quantile to reduce crowding exposure. Two fields used. Confidence 0.69.

results.idea: Momentum amplified by prospect daily positive surprises
results.description: Boost momentum scores where prospect_specret_daily is positive, indicating supportive idiosyncratic news. Two fields used. Confidence 0.71.

results.idea: Short-interest momentum cv filter (coefficient of variation)
results.description: Compute short-interest variability via ts_std_dev and prefer momentum when short-interest CV is low. Two fields used (derived ts_std_dev). Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Momentum constrained by specific risk variance quantile
results.description: Only accept momentum if specific_risk_variance below a selected quantile to minimize idiosyncratic noise. Two fields used. Confidence 0.70.
Subtract a fraction of short-term reversal to prevent chasing transient spikes. Two fields used. Confidence 0.69.
Detect names breaking into higher hedge-fund ownership percent percentile while momentum turns positive — capture accumulation breakouts. Two fields used. Confidence 0.67.
Neutralize momentum by market factor loading to reduce systematic exposure by subtracting market loading times its mean. Two fields used. Confidence 0.72.
Select momentum trades where prospect_specret_daily zscore is in top decile to capture strong idiosyncratic momentum. Two fields used. Confidence 0.70.

results.idea: Momentum filtered by management quality threshold
results.description: Require a minimum mgmtqlty loading before taking momentum to improve downside protection. Two fields used. Confidence 0.71.
